Key.Original: Cannot change teams without a duty officer present.
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有值班军官在场，不得更换队伍。

Key.Original: You must be an %1 to build, please see a Duty Officer.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你必须是%1才能建造，请找值班军官。

Key.Original: You can only have one speciality at a time.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你一次只能选择一个职业。

Key.Original: Your team already has a player with that speciality.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的小队已经有了一个具有该职业的玩家。

Key.Original: Supply drops on standby, make sure no other supplies are near drop zone.
Key.Chinesesimp: 空投补给待命中，确保投放区附近没有其他补给。

Key.Original: This vehicle can't be used by your team
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的队伍无法使用该载具

Key.Original: PLEI MEI SF CAMP - MIKE FORCE
Key.Chinesesimp: PLEI MEI特种部队营地——机动打击部队司令部
PLEIKU——绿色大黄蜂(休伊直升机)
FOB 5 BAN ME THUOT——装甲运兵突击车(ACAV)

Key.Original: KHE SANH SF CAMP - MIKE FORCE
Key.Chinesesimp: 溪山特种部队营地——机动打击部队司令部

Key.Original: KHE SANH SF CAMP - GREEN HORNETS
Key.Chinesesimp: 溪山特种部队营地——绿色大黄蜂(休伊直升机)

Key.Original: KHE SANH SF CAMP - SPIKE TEAM
Key.Chinesesimp: 溪山特种部队营地——SPIKE TEAM

Key.Original:
Note: Engineer training required!

Press 'N' to enable/disable building.

Use mouse scroll wheel for adjustments, press Alt to cycle between height adjustment or rotation.

Press and hold 'Space' to finalize Build.
Key.Chinesesimp:
注意：需要进行工程兵培训！

按'N'来启用/禁用建造。

使用鼠标滚轮进行调整，按Alt键在高度调整或旋转之间切换。

按住空格以完成建造。

Key.Original:
Press 'Y' to use gesture menu ('Z' on QWERTZ keyboards).

Press 'H' to open task roster.

Press '6' to activate wheel menu.
Key.Chinesesimp:
按'Y'来使用手势菜单（QWERTZ布局键盘，按'Z'）。

按'H'键打开任务列表。

按'6'键激活滚轮菜单。
南越空中勇士十字勋章
越南春季攻势战役纪念章
美国空军杰出集体勋章

Key.Original: Gulf of Tonkin Vietnam Commemorative Medal
Key.Chinesesimp: 越南北部湾战斗纪念勋章

Key.Original: RVN Military Merit First Republic Medal
Key.Chinesesimp: 南越第一共和国军功勋章

Key.Original: You toggled off the interaction overlay.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你停用了互动提示界面。

Key.Original: You toggled on the interaction overlay.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你启用了互动提示界面。

Key.Original:
As special forces infantry, your team's role is to:
- Sweep and clear areas of enemy
- Secure and hold zones
- Protect populations, logistics and supplies
- Reinforce other teams
Tasks
- Primary Tasks are shared by all teams.
- Secondary Tasks are unique to your team.
- Support Tasks are called by other teams in need of your help. You may also request their support, for example transport is provided for you by ACAV or Green Hornets.
Key.Chinesesimp:
作为特种部队的步兵，你们的小队的角色是:
- 扫荡和清理敌方区域
- 夺取并控制区域
- 保护人口、后勤和物资
- 支援其他小队
任务
- 主要任务由所有小队共同承担。。
- 次要任务是你的小队所独有的。
- 支援任务由其他需要你帮助的小队呼叫申请。你也可以请求他们的支援，例如，由ACAV或绿色大黄蜂为你提供运输服务。

Key.Original:
As special forces recon, your team's role is to:
- Carry out reconnaissance to locate enemy infrastructure
- Ambush and assault the enemy
- Direct air and armour support onto enemy concentrations
- Support other teams with reconnaissance and search and rescue
Tasks
- Primary Tasks are shared by all teams.
- Secondary Tasks are unique to your team.
- Support Tasks are called by other teams in need of your help. You may also request their support, for example transport is provided for you by ACAV or Green Hornets.
Key.Chinesesimp:
作为特种部队的侦察兵，你们的小队的角色是:
- 进行侦察以确定敌人基础设施的位置
- 伏击和攻击敌人
- 指引空军和装甲部队打击敌军集结点
- 支援其他队伍进行侦察、搜索和救援
任务
- 主要任务由所有小队共同承担。
- 次要任务是你的小队所独有的。
- 支援任务由其他需要你帮助的小队呼叫申请。你也可以请求他们的支援，例如，由ACAV或绿色大黄蜂为你提供运输服务。

Key.Original:
As a Green Hornet, your team's role is to fly helicopters and jets to:
- Insert and extract troops to their desired location
- Carry out aerial reconnaissance to find enemy infrastructure
- Support other teams with close air support
- Deliver supplies to build new infrastructure
- Engage enemy aircraft
Tasks
- Primary Tasks are shared by all teams.
- Secondary Tasks are unique to your team.
- Support Tasks are called by other teams in need of your help. You may also request their support, for example search and rescue is provided for you by Spike Team.
Key.Chinesesimp:
作为一名绿色大黄蜂的飞行员，你们的小队的角色是:
- 运输或撤离兵员到规划的位置
- 执行空中侦察，寻找敌人的基础设施
- 近距离空中支援(CAS)其他小队
- 运送物资以建设新基础设施
- 与敌机交战
任务
- 主要任务由所有小队共同承担。
- 次要任务是你的小队所独有的。
- 支援任务由其他需要你帮助的小队呼叫申请。你也可以请求他们的支援，例如，由Spike小队为您提供搜索和救援任务。

Key.Original:
As Armoured Cavalry, your team's role is to operate trucks and tanks to:
- Insert and extract troops to their desired location
- Support other teams with heavy weapons vehicles
- Deliver supplies and build new infrastructure
- Engage enemy vehicles and armour
Tasks
- Primary Tasks are shared by all teams.
- Secondary Tasks are unique to your team.
- Support Tasks are called by other teams in need of your help. You may also request their support, for example vehicle recovery or convoy protection is provided for you by Green Hornets.
Key.Chinesesimp:
作为装甲兵，你们的小队的作用是操作卡车和坦克来:
- 运输或撤离兵员到规划的位置
- 用重型武装车辆支援其他小队
- 运送物资，建设新基础设施
- 与敌方车辆和装甲交战
任务
- 主要任务由所有小队共同承担。
- 次要任务是你的小队所独有的。
- 支援任务由其他需要你帮助的小队呼叫申请。你也可以请求他们的支援，例如，由绿色大黄蜂为您提供车辆恢复或车队保护。
驾驶武装直升机/固定翼

Key.Original: Transport the supplies to the position provided by %1.
Key.Chinesesimp: 将物资运送到%1所指定的地点。

Key.Original: Deliver the resupply crate to the units that need it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送补给箱到需要的单位那。

Key.Original: Request ammo supplies be dropped at a specific location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求在指定地点投放弹药补给。

Key.Original: Request medical supplies be dropped at a specific location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求在指定地点投放医疗补给。

Key.Original: Request food supplies be dropped at a specific location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求在指定地点投放食物补给。

Key.Original: Request building materials be dropped at a specific location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求在指定地点投放建筑材料补给。

Key.Original: Request workshop supplies be dropped at a specific location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求在指定地点投放维修车间补给。

Key.Original: Change teams or train in a role, such as engineer.
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换团队或培训角色，例如工程兵

Key.Original: Teleport to the bases of each team
Request supplies, such as building supplies, food or ammunition.
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求补给，如建筑材料供应，食物或弹药。
建筑损耗时间：%1 小时 %2 分钟

Key.Original: The enemy will counter-attack in %2 minutes
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人将在 %2 分钟后反攻。

Key.Original: The enemy will attack an FOB in %2 minutes
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人将在 %2 分钟后袭击FOB

Key.Original: Enemy attack on FOB is imminent!
All critical tasks completed. Enemy counter attack in %2 minutes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有关键任务已完成。敌人将在 %2 分钟内发起反攻。

Key.Original: Sandbags cannot be used on this building
Key.Chinesesimp: 沙袋不能用于该建筑上

Key.Original: You can't resupply an unbuilt building
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不能对未建成的建筑进行再补给

Key.Original:
[LMB]/[RMB] to cycle placement mode.

Building can be placed with the 'build' action when the building is green. Buildings must not be colliding, and must be placed on a surface.
Key.Chinesesimp:
[鼠标左键]/[鼠标右键] 循环放置模式。

当建筑为绿色时，可以用"建造"动作来放置建筑。建筑物不能有碰撞，且必须放置在一个表面上。

Key.Original: [WARNING] Deletes your saved game. This will delete all progress (ranks and map)!
Key.Chinesesimp: [警告]删除你所保存的游戏。这将删除所有的进度(军衔和地图)!
==== 启用军衔制度[正在开发中] ====

Key.Original: [High performance impact] The maximum number of AI the mission will ever have simultaneously.
Key.Chinesesimp: [高性能影响]任务将同时拥有的最大AI数量

Key.Original: Restrict vehicles/weapons based on rank. Recommended to reduce griefing.
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据军衔限制车辆/武器使用。推荐启用，以减少恶意破坏事件。

Key.Original: Should vehicles be required to build resupply buildings [Not Advised].
Key.English: Should vehicles be required to build resupply buildings [Not Advised].
Key.Chinesesimp: 是否需要车辆来建造补给建筑物[不建议].

Key.Original: Toggles whether withstand is always available, or only when alone.
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换抵抗是否始终可用或只在单独时可用。

Key.Original: The building supplies value of sandbags carried in the inventory.
Key.Chinesesimp: 建筑物供应库存中所装载沙袋的价值。
启用高阶复苏功能(推荐)

Key.Original: How close a snake must be to bite a player
Key.English: How close a snake must be to bite a player
Key.Chinesesimp: 蛇要多近才能咬到玩家

Key.Original: Minimum Amount of time between bites
Key.English: Minimum Amount of time between bites

Key.Original: Amount of time with a reduced chance of being bitten. Starts counting after the bite frequency time has elapsed.
Key.English: Amount of time with a reduced chance of being bitten. Starts counting after the bite frequency time has elapsed.
Key.Chinesesimp: 减少被咬的几率的时间。开始计数后，咬频时间已经过去。
==== 绿色大黄蜂最大玩家数 ====

Key.Original: The percentage of the hunger bar lost every 10 seconds
Key.English: The percentage of the hunger bar lost every 10 seconds
Key.Chinesesimp: 每10秒消耗的饥饿条百分比

Key.Original: The percentage of the thirst bar lost every 10 seconds
Key.English: The percentage of the thirst bar lost every 10 seconds
Key.Chinesesimp: 每10秒消耗的饥渴条百分比

Key.Original: Toggle if headshots can cause instadeath
Key.English: Toggle if headshots can cause instadeath
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换爆头是否会导致立即死亡

Key.Original: The time it takes in seconds for a wounded player to die
Key.English: The time it takes in seconds for a wounded player to die
Key.Chinesesimp: 受伤的玩家在多少秒钟内阵亡

Key.Original: Percentage of bleedout time that must pass before withstanding is allowed
Key.English: Percentage of bleedout time that must pass before withstanding is allowed
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许抵抗之前必须通过的失血时间百分比

Key.Original: Remove the item used to stabilize a patient
Key.English: Remove the item used to stabilize a patient
Key.Chinesesimp: 取出用来稳定伤员的东西

Key.Original: Remove the item used to revive a patient
Key.English: Remove the item used to revive a patient
Key.Chinesesimp: 取出用来救活伤员的东西

Key.Original: Unique supports only will disable support from fast air and rotary wing units
Key.English: Unique supports only will disable support from fast air and rotary wing units
Key.Chinesesimp: 唯一的支援将使快速空中和旋翼单位的支援失效

Key.Original: Prevents deletion for certain objects, if a player is within X metres
Key.English: Prevents deletion for certain objects, if a player is within X metres
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果玩家在X米范围内，防止删除某些物体

Key.Original: Enables deleting equipment placed on the ground by players.
Key.English: Enables deleting equipment placed on the ground by players.
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许删除玩家放在地上的装备。
==== 放置装备的最短存在时间 ====

Key.Original: Minimum amount of time before placed equipment is deleted.
Key.English: Minimum amount of time before placed equipment is deleted.
Key.Chinesesimp: 删除放置装备前的最小时间
==== 跌落装备最短存在时间 ====

Key.Original: A vote has been initalized. For more details please open the menu.
Key.Chinesesimp: 已初始化投票。欲了解更多详情，请打开菜单。

Key.Original: This building isn't functioning right now.
The building doesn't have enough resources to do that.
Clear the area where the vehicle will be created.
The next vehicle will be available in %1 minutes.
Key.Chinesesimp: 下一辆载具 %1 分钟后可用
用物资给载具补充燃料
用物资给载具补充弹药
